summary: FEB 2003, VEHICLE IS APPROX. 4 YEARS OLD, SERPENTINE BELT CAME OFF PULLEY, RESULTING IN LOSS OF POWER STEERING.  DIFFICULTY TURNING WHICH ALMOST RESULTED IN 5 ACCIDENTS - HEAD ON COLLISION.  RESULTED IN 3 ACCIDENTS BY BEING UNABLE TO TURN VEHICLE, HITTING SNOW BANKS,  FACTOR INVOLVED IS HEAVY SNOW STORM, APPROX 3 FEET.  REPLACED BELTS AND PUMP.  VEHICLE IS OUT OF WARRANTY, I PAID NEARLY $600.00.*JB
